attributes.background: Knife crime on the streets of London has become an ever increasing problem.  I think we should ban knives on the streets unless for culinary purpose  . Any other knife you need to be registered  and background checked to own and to carry in public have a permit with proof of a valid reason .

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular, we're not sure whether you'd like to ban carrying a knife or whether you'd like to introduce a register and background checks.  

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might also like to sign one of these petitions instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/216928

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/210359

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/214452

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/217203
